thread.title: 4 Landscape Photography Tutorials All About Post-Processing
thread.title_full: 4 Landscape Photography Tutorials All About Post-Processing

author: Alejandro Santiago
title: 4 Landscape Photography Tutorials All About Post-Processing
text:
4. How To Transform Your Landscape Photos Into Surreal Infrared Images by Alfonso Novillo 
Infrared film creates a dream-like quality in your photos where bright skies appear dark and green foliage looks white. This tutorial teaches you how to add this surreal look to your digital photos. 
Now that you’ve checked out these tutorials, it’s time to put these skills to work! Experiment with these new techniques and upload your results to 500px . Show us your post-processing skills by posting your photos in the comments section below. We will share the best images on the 500px Twitter account . Related
